dialogueItems.speaker: Mike
dialogueItems.name: Mike
dialogueItems.dialogue: Greetings. My name is Mike. This is a test.

dialogueItems.speaker: You
dialogueItems.name: You
dialogueItems.dialogue: A Test?

dialogueItems.speaker: Mike
dialogueItems.name: Mike
dialogueItems.dialogue: Indeed! We are testing to see if the graphs are working before we integrate it into the game.

dialogueItems.speaker: You
dialogueItems.name: You
dialogueItems.dialogue: Are they working?

dialogueItems.speaker: Mike
dialogueItems.name: Mike
dialogueItems.dialogue: I hope so. Why don't you try it out. Click an option bellow.

dialogueItems.speaker: You
dialogueItems.name: You
dialogueItems.dialogue: I choose Option 1

dialogueItems.speaker: Mike
dialogueItems.name: Mike
dialogueItems.dialogue: A strange choice... But the graph seems to be working fine.

dialogueItems.speaker: Mike
dialogueItems.name: Mike
dialogueItems.dialogue: Now go back and try the other options.

dialogueItems.speaker: You
dialogueItems.name: You
dialogueItems.dialogue: I choose Option 2

dialogueItems.speaker: Mike
dialogueItems.name: Mike
dialogueItems.dialogue: In all the time that I have spent testing, you are the first to choose that option.

dialogueItems.speaker: You
dialogueItems.name: You
dialogueItems.dialogue: Did the test work?

dialogueItems.speaker: Mike
dialogueItems.name: Mike
dialogueItems.dialogue: Well you have made it this far so I assume it has! Well done!

dialogueItems.speaker: You
dialogueItems.name: You
dialogueItems.dialogue: Cool. What do you need me to do?

dialogueItems.speaker: Mike
dialogueItems.name: Mike
dialogueItems.dialogue: Repeat after me... This

dialogueItems.speaker: You
dialogueItems.name: You
dialogueItems.dialogue: This...

dialogueItems.speaker: You
dialogueItems.name: You
dialogueItems.dialogue: That...

dialogueItems.speaker: Mike
dialogueItems.name: Mike
dialogueItems.dialogue: No! No! No!

dialogueItems.speaker: Mike
dialogueItems.name: Mike
dialogueItems.dialogue: Is...

dialogueItems.speaker: You
dialogueItems.name: You
dialogueItems.dialogue: Is...

dialogueItems.speaker: You
dialogueItems.name: You
dialogueItems.dialogue: Was...

dialogueItems.speaker: Mike
dialogueItems.name: Mike
dialogueItems.dialogue: Come on! Focus! Repeat after me!

dialogueItems.speaker: Mike
dialogueItems.name: Mike
dialogueItems.dialogue: Working.

dialogueItems.speaker: You
dialogueItems.name: You
dialogueItems.dialogue: Working.

dialogueItems.speaker: Mike
dialogueItems.name: Mike
dialogueItems.dialogue: Hehehehehe see what I did at the end there. I wanted to make extra sure that you didn't get it wrong.

dialogueItems.speaker: Mike
dialogueItems.name: Mike
dialogueItems.dialogue: Well alright then, the test seems to be working!

dialogueItems.speaker: Humphrey
dialogueItems.name: Guard
dialogueItems.dialogue: Oh, hello there. What are you doing wandering outside the gates alone? It's not safe.

dialogueItems.speaker: Humphrey
dialogueItems.name: Guard
dialogueItems.dialogue: Thank you kind sir

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Player
dialogueItems.dialogue: Not safe?

dialogueItems.speaker: Humphrey
dialogueItems.name: Guard
dialogueItems.dialogue: Indeed, the lands outside of the city of Ewtopia are wild and filled with thieves.

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Player
dialogueItems.dialogue: The city of Ewtopia?

dialogueItems.speaker: Humphrey
dialogueItems.name: Guard
dialogueItems.dialogue: That's right! It is my job to watch the gate and defend this great city!

dialogueItems.speaker: Humphrey
dialogueItems.name: Humphrey
dialogueItems.dialogue: My name's Humphrey by the way.

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Player
dialogueItems.dialogue: Kane.

dialogueItems.speaker: Humphrey
dialogueItems.name: Humphrey
dialogueItems.dialogue: I've never seen you around here before. Is this your first time visiting Ewtopia?

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: Yep, although I am just passing through, I doubt I will stay long.

dialogueItems.speaker: Humphrey
dialogueItems.name: Humphrey
dialogueItems.dialogue: Here, I will open the gate for sure. Speak to the Captain, he should be able to show you more of the city.

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: Thanks Humphrey, I'll see you around.

dialogueItems.speaker: Humphrey
dialogueItems.name: Humphrey
dialogueItems.dialogue: I'll be here. Enjoy your stay!

dialogueItems.speaker: Humphrey
dialogueItems.name: Humphrey
dialogueItems.dialogue: As much as I hate standing in this heat all day, nothing beats the views from here.

dialogueItems.speaker: Gilbert
dialogueItems.name: Unlikable
dialogueItems.dialogue: Good day sir.

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: You don't look like everybody else.

dialogueItems.speaker: Gilbert
dialogueItems.name: Unlikable
dialogueItems.dialogue: You're right sir. But not too long ago, I was just as beautiful as them.

dialogueItems.speaker: Gilbert
dialogueItems.name: Unlikeable
dialogueItems.dialogue: I worked at the bank, sorting the coins. I was actually really good at it! Fast-hands Gilbert they used to call me.

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: So what happened?

dialogueItems.speaker: Gilbert
dialogueItems.name: Gilbert
dialogueItems.dialogue: I lost it all sir. The bank could not afford to hire me so they threw me out.

dialogueItems.speaker: Gilbert
dialogueItems.name: Gilbert
dialogueItems.dialogue: Everybody else abandoned me, I was alone.

dialogueItems.speaker: Gilbert
dialogueItems.name: Gilbert
dialogueItems.dialogue: But that's enough about me. I've never seen you here before. Are you new?

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: It's my first time here. It seems like a nice place.

dialogueItems.speaker: Gilbert
dialogueItems.name: Gilbert
dialogueItems.dialogue: Don't be fooled, the people here may seem friendly, but they only care about themselves. That is the reason this city is falling apart.

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: I'll keep that in mind.

dialogueItems.speaker: Gilbert
dialogueItems.name: Gilbert
dialogueItems.dialogue: But you seem like a kind fellow. Do you think you could help me out?

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: What do you need?

dialogueItems.speaker: Gilbert
dialogueItems.name: Gilbert
dialogueItems.dialogue: Sir, I have nothing at the moment, not even a roof over my head. Could you spare any change?

dialogueItems.speaker: Gilbert
dialogueItems.name: Gilbert
dialogueItems.dialogue: Thank you so much kind sir! I will be forever grateful!

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: I'm sorry, I don't have any on me right now

dialogueItems.speaker: Gilbert
dialogueItems.name: Gilbert
dialogueItems.dialogue: That's no problem sir. I don't expect anything from you. Have a pleasant day!

dialogueItems.speaker: Gilbert
dialogueItems.name: Gilbert
dialogueItems.dialogue: Hello my friend! I hope that you are having a wonderful day.

dialogueItems.speaker: Gilbert
dialogueItems.name: Gilbert
dialogueItems.dialogue: Is there something you need?

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: No, nothing. I should be going now.

dialogueItems.speaker: Gilbert
dialogueItems.name: Gilbert
dialogueItems.dialogue: Have a pleasant day sir!

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: Here, this is for you.

dialogueItems.speaker: Gilbert
dialogueItems.name: Gilbert
dialogueItems.dialogue: Oh wow! Thank you so much sir!

dialogueItems.speaker: Gilbert
dialogueItems.name: Gilbert
dialogueItems.dialogue: I shall never forget this generosity!

dialogueItems.speaker: Gilbert
dialogueItems.name: Gilbert
dialogueItems.dialogue: I will forever remember your kindness! Bless you!

dialogueItems.speaker: Captain
dialogueItems.name: Guard Captain
dialogueItems.dialogue: Ah, a new face in Ewtopia. You don't see that every day.

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: I'm Kane. I'm just passing through.

dialogueItems.speaker: Captain
dialogueItems.name: Guard Captain
dialogueItems.dialogue: Well, Kane, I can't speak with you at the moment. I am up to my hinges in paperwork, and that brat has been causing trouble again.

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: Brat?

dialogueItems.speaker: Captain
dialogueItems.name: Guard Captain
dialogueItems.dialogue: His name is Chester, he is always standing in front of the bank screaming out his nonsense.

dialogueItems.speaker: Captain
dialogueItems.name: Guard Captain
dialogueItems.dialogue: You know what, you seem like a reasonable chap. Why don't you go talk some sense into him? Perhaps he would listen to you.

dialogueItems.speaker: Captain
dialogueItems.name: Guard Captain
dialogueItems.dialogue: Ah very good, return to me when you have sorted out this little problem.

dialogueItems.speaker: Captain
dialogueItems.name: Guard Captain
dialogueItems.dialogue: I see, I'll just have to deal with it later.

dialogueItems.speaker: Captain
dialogueItems.name: Guard Captain
dialogueItems.dialogue: Come speak to me again if you change your mind.

dialogueItems.speaker: Captain
dialogueItems.name: Captain
dialogueItems.dialogue: Chester is still making a noise outside of the bank. Get him to quiet down and you will be rewarded.

dialogueItems.speaker: Captain
dialogueItems.name: Captain
dialogueItems.dialogue: What do you say? Can you help me out?

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: Alright, I'll see if I can sort it out.

dialogueItems.speaker: Captain
dialogueItems.name: Captain
dialogueItems.dialogue: Brilliant! Return to me when you are finished.

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: I can't right now.

dialogueItems.speaker: Captain
dialogueItems.name: Captain
dialogueItems.dialogue: Alright, talk to me again if you change your mind.

dialogueItems.speaker: Captain
dialogueItems.name: Captain
dialogueItems.dialogue: Ah I see that you finally got Chester to keep quiet! What a task that must have been.

dialogueItems.speaker: Captain
dialogueItems.name: Captain
dialogueItems.dialogue: As promised, here is your reward.

dialogueItems.speaker: Captain
dialogueItems.name: Captain
dialogueItems.dialogue: I can't talk now. I have way too much work to do.

dialogueItems.speaker: Chester
dialogueItems.name: Chester
dialogueItems.dialogue: FOR TOO LONG THIS CITY HAS PREYED ON THE WEAK TO FEED THE STRONG!

dialogueItems.speaker: Chester
dialogueItems.name: Chester
dialogueItems.dialogue: STAND WITH ME, FRIENDS, TO FREE US FROM THE CLUTCHES OF OUR CORRUPTED MAYOR!

dialogueItems.speaker: Chester
dialogueItems.name: Chester
dialogueItems.dialogue: You there! You are new around here right?

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: I am. The Captain sent me to speak with you.

dialogueItems.speaker: Chester
dialogueItems.name: Chester
dialogueItems.dialogue: So the Captain is now relying on strangers to do his dirty work. Disgraceful.

dialogueItems.speaker: Chester
dialogueItems.name: Chester
dialogueItems.dialogue: I imagine he wants you to shut me up. Well you can hop back and tell him where to stick it.

dialogueItems.speaker: Chester
dialogueItems.name: Chester
dialogueItems.dialogue: For too long those with power have tried to silence the rest of us! I will allow it no longer!

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: Silence you?

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: I am beginning to understand why. Look, the Captain sent me to do a task, and I will make sure that it is completed.

dialogueItems.speaker: Chester
dialogueItems.name: Chester
dialogueItems.dialogue: Yes! Look around you! See those dull looking chests over there. The rich don't care about Ewtopians like them... Ewtopians like me.

dialogueItems.speaker: Chester
dialogueItems.name: Chester
dialogueItems.dialogue: How about this, I have a counter-offer for you. You will help me out if there is still some good left in you.

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: What causes you to look like that?

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: Alright, I'm listening.

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: Do I look like a task boy? Sort it out by yourself.

dialogueItems.speaker: Chester
dialogueItems.name: Chester
dialogueItems.dialogue: You see, when a Ewtopian has nothing left, not even a house to live in, we start to dull. It is the mark of the 'Unlikeables'.

dialogueItems.speaker: Chester
dialogueItems.name: Chester
dialogueItems.dialogue: Everybody in the city ignores us, we never get the help that we need.

dialogueItems.speaker: Chester
dialogueItems.name: Chester
dialogueItems.dialogue: But I have a plan to change that. However, I cannot do it on my own. Are you willing to help me?

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: I'm in. What do you need from me?

dialogueItems.speaker: Chester
dialogueItems.name: Chester
dialogueItems.dialogue: Splendid! The mayor has a shipment of change coming in today. I can't get anywhere near him looking like this, but you look so bright and vibrant!

dialogueItems.speaker: Chester
dialogueItems.name: Chester
dialogueItems.dialogue: A delivery man is supposed to collect the coins from him to take to the bank. Pretend to be the delivery man and speak to the mayor. I will make sure the real one never reaches him.

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: That seems easy enough, I will get you those coins.

dialogueItems.speaker: Chester
dialogueItems.name: Chester
dialogueItems.dialogue: Oh, there is one last thing you should know. The mayor always uses a secret password during these deliveries.

dialogueItems.speaker: Chester
dialogueItems.name: Chester
dialogueItems.dialogue: Lucky for you, I have overheard them using the password before. If the mayor asks you, the password is 'furtive'

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: Furtive, got it.

dialogueItems.speaker: Chester
dialogueItems.name: Chester
dialogueItems.dialogue: Godspeed my friend

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: No, I can't help you right now.

dialogueItems.speaker: Chester
dialogueItems.name: Chester
dialogueItems.dialogue: I see. This tells me a lot about who you really are.

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: Well I'm done here. I must get going.

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: Yes, I am someone who does what they have said they will do.

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: Now you will shut your lid and move away from this area or I will be forced to use less passive methods.

dialogueItems.speaker: Chester
dialogueItems.name: Chester
dialogueItems.dialogue: Okay buddy, calm down. Have it your way. I'll move.

dialogueItems.speaker: Chester
dialogueItems.name: Chester
dialogueItems.dialogue: Ah it's you again.

dialogueItems.speaker: Chester
dialogueItems.name: Chester
dialogueItems.dialogue: My offer still stands.

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: On behalf of the captain, I would like you to stop your shouting and move away from this area.

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: If you do not comply with this, I could use more extreme measures... and you definitely don't want that.

dialogueItems.speaker: Chester
dialogueItems.name: Chester
dialogueItems.dialogue: You are just like everybody else, always silencing the helpless.

dialogueItems.speaker: Chester
dialogueItems.name: Chester
dialogueItems.dialogue: Fine, have it your way, I'll move. I hope that you are happy with your decision.

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: Tell me about this offer.

dialogueItems.speaker: Chester
dialogueItems.name: Chester
dialogueItems.dialogue: It involves stealing from the mayor, it could be very profitable for both of us. Are you willing to help me out?

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: I'm in. What do you need from me?

dialogueItems.speaker: Chester
dialogueItems.name: Chester
dialogueItems.dialogue: Splendid! The mayor has a shipment of change coming in today. I can't get anywhere near him looking like this, but you look so bright and vibrant!

dialogueItems.speaker: Chester
dialogueItems.name: Chester
dialogueItems.dialogue: A delivery man is supposed to collect the coins from him to take to the bank. Pretend to be the delivery man and speak to the mayor. I will make sure the real one never reaches him.

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: That seems easy enough, I will get you those coins.

dialogueItems.speaker: Chester
dialogueItems.name: Chester
dialogueItems.dialogue: Oh, there is one last thing you should know. The mayor always uses a secret password during these deliveries.

dialogueItems.speaker: Chester
dialogueItems.name: Chester
dialogueItems.dialogue: Lucky for you, I have overheard them using the password before. If the mayor asks you, the password is 'furtive'

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: Furtive, got it.

dialogueItems.speaker: Chester
dialogueItems.name: Chester
dialogueItems.dialogue: Godspeed my friend

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: Not right now

dialogueItems.speaker: Chester
dialogueItems.name: Chester
dialogueItems.dialogue: I see. Come speak to me again if you change your mind.

dialogueItems.speaker: Chester
dialogueItems.name: Chester
dialogueItems.dialogue: I heard that someone tried to steal from the mayor. I'm guessing you couldn't complete the task.

dialogueItems.speaker: Chester
dialogueItems.name: Chester
dialogueItems.dialogue: Oh well, I'm going to have to think of another way to help my people.

dialogueItems.speaker: Chester
dialogueItems.name: Chester
dialogueItems.dialogue: At least you tried. Goodbye for now.

dialogueItems.speaker: Chester
dialogueItems.name: Chester
dialogueItems.dialogue: Go speak to the mayor and bring me back some of those coins!

dialogueItems.speaker: Chester
dialogueItems.name: Chester
dialogueItems.dialogue: Oh, it's you... I have nothing to say to you.

dialogueItems.speaker: Chester
dialogueItems.name: Chester
dialogueItems.dialogue: WHEN WILL YOU ALL OPEN YOUR EYES AND SEE WHAT OUR SOCIETY HAS BECOME?

dialogueItems.speaker: Chester
dialogueItems.name: Chester
dialogueItems.dialogue: LOOK AROUND YOU! THIS CITY IS DYING! OUR MAYOR HAS FAILED US

dialogueItems.speaker: Chester
dialogueItems.name: Chester
dialogueItems.dialogue: WE NEED TO STAND TOGETHER AGAINST THIS INJUSTICE!

dialogueItems.speaker: Chester
dialogueItems.name: Chester
dialogueItems.dialogue: You got the change! I never doubted you for a second!

dialogueItems.speaker: Chester
dialogueItems.name: Chester
dialogueItems.dialogue: I'll tell you what, since you did all of the heavy lifting, I'll let you keep two thirds of the profit.

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: Here you go.

dialogueItems.speaker: Chester
dialogueItems.name: Chester
dialogueItems.dialogue: If you are looking to do some more good, you could give some of those remaining coins to a few of the other Unlikeables.

dialogueItems.speaker: Chester
dialogueItems.name: Chester
dialogueItems.dialogue: Or you could keep it for yourself. It's up to you.

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: It was a pleasure doing business with you.

dialogueItems.speaker: Chester
dialogueItems.name: Chester
dialogueItems.dialogue: Farewell my friend.

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: On second thought, I think I should hold onto these. I did in fact do all of the risky work.

dialogueItems.speaker: Chester
dialogueItems.name: Chester
dialogueItems.dialogue: How did I not see this coming? You are all the same.

dialogueItems.speaker: Chester
dialogueItems.name: Chester
dialogueItems.dialogue: The cycle continues. The rich get richer while we rot away on the side.

dialogueItems.speaker: Chester
dialogueItems.name: Chester
dialogueItems.dialogue: People like you will never help people like me. That is why this society will never change.

dialogueItems.speaker: Chester
dialogueItems.name: Chester
dialogueItems.dialogue: So keep your riches and enjoy your comfort. Never forget about me, this decision will stay with you for the rest of your life.

dialogueItems.speaker: Chester
dialogueItems.name: Chester
dialogueItems.dialogue: I know it will stay with me.

dialogueItems.speaker: Chester
dialogueItems.name: Chester
dialogueItems.dialogue: Good day friend! I do hope that you have been using those coins for good!

dialogueItems.speaker: Chester
dialogueItems.name: Chester
dialogueItems.dialogue: I was hoping never to see you again. It seems my luck keeps getting worse.

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: Hello Mr. Mayor.

dialogueItems.speaker: Mayor
dialogueItems.name: Mayor
dialogueItems.dialogue: And who might you be?

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: I'm here to deliver the coins to the bank.

dialogueItems.speaker: Mayor
dialogueItems.name: Mayor
dialogueItems.dialogue: Ah, I see. Is Clarence not feeling well today?

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: Yeah, I am his replacement.

dialogueItems.speaker: Mayor
dialogueItems.name: Mayor
dialogueItems.dialogue: Replacement you say... Do you know the secret code?

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: The passcode is Furtive

dialogueItems.speaker: Mayor
dialogueItems.name: Mayor
dialogueItems.dialogue: Very good. Take care when transporting these coins please, they are very valuable.

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: Will do.

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: What secret code?

dialogueItems.speaker: Mayor
dialogueItems.name: Mayor
dialogueItems.dialogue: AHA! I knew that you weren't the delivery boy! I should have you arrested on the spot!

dialogueItems.speaker: Mayor
dialogueItems.name: Mayor
dialogueItems.dialogue: Leave here at once and don't ever try something like that again!

dialogueItems.speaker: Mayor
dialogueItems.name: Mayor
dialogueItems.dialogue: Ah it's the delivery boy! I assume my package arrived safely at the bank.

dialogueItems.speaker: Mayor
dialogueItems.name: Mayor
dialogueItems.dialogue: The thief is back. Get out of my sight before I call the guard.

dialogueItems.speaker: Mayor
dialogueItems.name: Mayor
dialogueItems.dialogue: Not now, I don't have time for silly conversation.

dialogueItems.speaker: Unlikeable
dialogueItems.name: Unlikeable
dialogueItems.dialogue: I have been like this for so long, I have forgotten what it feels like to be normal.

dialogueItems.speaker: Unlikeable
dialogueItems.name: Unlikeable
dialogueItems.dialogue: Is there something you wanted to ask me?

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: No, nothing. I'd best be going.

dialogueItems.speaker: Unlikeable
dialogueItems.name: Unlikeable
dialogueItems.dialogue: Have a pleasant day!

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: I wanted to give you this.

dialogueItems.speaker: Unlikeable
dialogueItems.name: Unlikeable
dialogueItems.dialogue: I can't believe my eyes! Thank you so much stranger!

dialogueItems.speaker: Unlikeable
dialogueItems.name: Unlikeable
dialogueItems.dialogue: Your kindness shall not soon be forgotten. Have a wonderful day!

dialogueItems.speaker: Unlikeable
dialogueItems.name: Unlikeable
dialogueItems.dialogue: Hello kind stranger! You have no idea how much you have helped me!

dialogueItems.speaker: Citizen
dialogueItems.name: Citizen
dialogueItems.dialogue: Watch out for those Unlikeables, nasty bunch they are.
